column7: Students will work in depth within each professorâ€™s choreographic process, learning creative tools for generating dance material, directing performance, crafting choreographic ideas over a full semester and developing performance skills. 1 to 2 undergraduate hours. 1 to 2 graduate hours. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 4 credit hours. Prerequisite: Major standing in Dance or consent of instructor.
